channel.title: Pandoc on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in Pandoc on Dan Aukes

item.title: Useful Pandoc Commands
item.description: Get Current Templates pandoc --print-default-template=markdown > pandoc-template.md pandoc --print-default-template=latex>pandoc-template.tex simple markdown to pdf pandoc input-file.

item.title: Pandoc-Plus
item.description: A collection of utilities to make converting files easier in pandoc.

item.title: Powerpoint to Markdown Converter
item.description: A package for converting powerpoint files to markdown-beamer. requires pandoc, powerpoint
